text: aur jo shakhs khuda kee raah mein hijarat karega to vah rooe zameen mein ba faraagat (chain se rahane sahane ke) bahut se kushaada maqaam paega aur jo shakhs apane ghar se jilaavatan hoke khuda aur usake rasool kee taraf nikal khada hua phir use (manzile maqasood) tak pahunchane se pahale maut aa jae to khuda par usaka savaab laazim ho gaya aur khuda to bada bakhsh ne vaala meharabaan hai hee
